ygData.subject: Re: Harrasment and E'Ci...
ygData.msgSnippet: Though I hate to let mean poeple win, I also STILL hate the name Mystical Alliance!  Force of Synergy anyone ahhahahahah! :)   BUT SERIOUSLY, we should let
ygData.messageBody:
Though I hate to let mean poeple win, I also STILL hate the name Mystical
Alliance! Force of Synergy anyone ahhahahahah! :) BUT SERIOUSLY, we
should let David handle this, and he can work it out with Verant, they need
to get their act together, and start helping us out a bit. Unfortunatly I
think many of the poeple wqe deal with are young poeple who may not have the
emotional security or maturity to deal with gay poeple, or the fact that
there was a guild mistake, so we are going to end up having to defend
ourselves from all fronts...such is life...BTW: check out Teen People, Rob
and I are in it, page 156, not that i memorized it or anything :)

Additionally, thanks everyoinbe for your kind words and support reguardsing
the harassment, I have alkreayd e-mail Veranty, though i got an automated
reply from tech-support, even though i didint send it to tech, whatver i am
sure they will figure it out, i am giving them till next tuesday to reply
personally then i will call them, I'm not lwetting this drop because it was
VERY VERY bad, and extremely upsetting, but there is no way in hell i am
giving up Rodcet nife, my chatchter or this cool game for some idiot. If i
need anytihng form you guys, i'll let you know! thanks agaiun!!!
=============================
Joseph J. Normandin
josephn@...
http://acs.bu.edu:8001/~josephn
=============================
----- Original Message -----
From: <scollier@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 09, 1999 1:06 PM
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Harrasment and E'Ci...


> From: scollier@...
>
>
> Here's what's happened since Tuesday morning...
>
> 1) Signed on at 5am CST..saw someone on E'ci with the "Mystical Alliance"
> name by theirs. They were nonresponsive..probably AFK. They ran off and I
> continued to try and say Hi to them and they ignored me.
>
> 2) Talked to a Tigerhawk Wensday morning. VERY nice person. I asked him
> about the guild and he told me he knew it was a
> Gay/Bi/Lesbian/Transgendered etc. guild and loved the idea.
>
> 3) Wensday afternoon I spoke with the Guild leader (Tarismo), and it
wasn't
> David, and he was very upset that 'we' were trying to take HIS guild away
> from him. He told me it was DEFINATELY NOT based on what we had intended
as
> a guild, even though Tigerhawk said differently. He said that HE was first
> and he would NOT allow ANYONE to take the guild away from him. I told him
> that there must be a mix up and he should contact Verant to clear it up.
He
> exploded on me about that. I told him he should talk to a GM and not yell
> at me because I had no power. After this he refused to reply to any tells.
>
> 4) I petitioned a junior GM and told them about the guild mixup etc. and
he
> promised to esculate it to the powers that be. I thanked him and went
about
> my gaming.
>
> 5) At 11:45 pm I was getting ready to log after a lot of fun at Lake
Rather
> when I got a tell from one of their members accusing me of starting
rumors.
> He was VERY mean and would not listen to reason. I explained what had
> happened and why the confusion but he then became more abusive. After a
> minute or so, several other of their guild started sending really
mean..and
> I DO mean EVIL tells to me about this. I told them to let Verant/GMs take
> it from here but they verbally assaulted over and over. I eventually
calmed
> them down and logged for the night.
>
> Man...this is crazy. I don't KNOW what's happened but I think David
is
> right that we may have to delete the guild and start over again. Though
> with people like I met last night, I think it will be rather rough trying
> to parley with them about this mix up.
>
>
> Sandy
>
>
>
> >
